boltx.title: BoltX - AI Optimizations
boltx.enterpriseRequired: BoltX is available on Enterprise plan. Upgrade now to unlock AI-powered optimizations.

predictions.title: Abandonment Predictions
predictions.description: Real-time abandonment predictions using AI and machine learning

subtitles.highRiskSessions: Sessions at high or critical risk

table.title: High Risk Sessions
table.subtitle: Sessions with high or critical abandonment risk

help.title: How Predictions Work
help.subtitle: Learn about risk scores, model accuracy, and how to interpret prediction data

riskScore.title: Risk Score
riskScore.description: A numerical value (0-100) that indicates the likelihood of checkout abandonment. Higher scores mean higher risk. The score is calculated using machine learning models that analyze user behavior patterns.

riskLevels.title: Risk Levels
riskLevels.description: Sessions are categorized into four risk levels: Low (0-30%), Medium (31-50%), High (51-70%), and Critical (71-100%). Each level represents a different probability of abandonment and may trigger different interventions.

prediction.title: How Predictions Work
prediction.description: Predictions are made in real-time using AI models that analyze user behavior, checkout progress, time spent, errors encountered, and historical patterns. The model continuously learns and improves accuracy.

totalSessions.title: Total Sessions
totalSessions.description: The total number of checkout sessions in the selected time period. This includes all sessions regardless of their risk level or outcome.

highRisk.title: High Risk Sessions
highRisk.description: The number of sessions classified as High or Critical risk. These sessions have a 51%+ probability of abandonment and may benefit from interventions.

avgRisk.title: Average Risk Score
avgRisk.description: The average risk score across all sessions in the period. A higher average indicates more at-risk sessions overall. Compare this metric over time to track trends.

modelAccuracy.title: Model Accuracy
modelAccuracy.description: The prediction model's accuracy rate, measured by comparing predictions to actual outcomes. Higher accuracy means more reliable predictions. Models are continuously trained and improved.

howItWorks.title: How the Model Works
howItWorks.description: The AI model analyzes multiple factors including checkout step progress, time spent on each step, error frequency, form completion rates, and historical conversion patterns to predict abandonment risk.

features.title: Features Analyzed
features.description: The model considers: step duration, error count, field completion rates, session duration, device type, browser behavior, and historical user patterns to make accurate predictions.

accuracy.title: Model Accuracy
accuracy.description: Accuracy is measured by comparing predicted risk levels to actual outcomes. The model is continuously retrained with new data to improve accuracy over time. Typical accuracy ranges from 85-95%.

distribution.title: Risk Distribution Chart
distribution.description: Shows the distribution of sessions across different risk levels (Low, Medium, High, Critical). Helps identify the proportion of at-risk sessions in your checkout funnel.

trend.title: Risk Trend Chart
trend.description: Displays the average risk score over time, allowing you to track trends and identify periods with higher or lower abandonment risk. Useful for measuring the impact of optimizations.

table.title: Predictions Table
table.description: Lists individual high-risk sessions with session ID, risk score, risk level, prediction timestamp, and current status. Use this to identify specific sessions that may need attention.

interventions.title: Interventions
interventions.description: Automatic interventions to reduce checkout abandonment

table.title: Recent Interventions
table.subtitle: List of interventions applied in the selected period

help.title: How Interventions Work
help.subtitle: Learn about intervention types, metrics, and how to interpret the data

discount.title: Discount Intervention
discount.description: Automatically triggered when a session reaches high or critical risk levels. Offers a discount (percentage or fixed amount) to incentivize completion. Typically used for sessions with 70%+ abandonment risk.
discount.example: Special offer: Get 10% off your order!

security.title: Security Intervention
security.description: Shows security and trust messages during the payment step. Helps reduce user concerns about payment safety. Triggered at medium-high risk levels (50%+ risk) when user is on payment step.
security.example: Your payment is secure and encrypted

simplify.title: Simplify Intervention
simplify.description: Provides help and support messages when users encounter errors or spend too long on a step. Simplifies the process by offering assistance. Triggered at medium risk (40%+) with errors or long step duration.
simplify.example: Need help? Contact our support team

progress.title: Progress Intervention
progress.description: Motivational messages that encourage users to complete their purchase. Shows progress indicators and completion benefits. Triggered at lower risk levels (30%+) to maintain momentum.
progress.example: You're almost done! Complete your purchase

total.title: Total Interventions
total.description: The total number of interventions triggered in the selected time period. This includes all intervention types regardless of whether they were applied or not.

conversion.title: Conversion Rate
conversion.description: The overall conversion rate for sessions where interventions were applied. This metric shows how effective interventions are at converting at-risk sessions into completed purchases.

active.title: Active Configs
active.description: The number of intervention types that are currently enabled and have been configured. Each type (Discount, Security, Simplify, Progress) counts as one active config.

roi.title: Estimated ROI
roi.description: Return on Investment estimate based on additional revenue generated from interventions. Calculated by comparing conversion rates with and without interventions, accounting for discount costs.

threshold.title: Risk Threshold
threshold.description: The minimum risk score (0-100) required to trigger an intervention. Each intervention type has its own threshold. Higher thresholds mean interventions only trigger for higher-risk sessions.

riskLevels.title: Risk Levels
riskLevels.description: Sessions are categorized by abandonment risk: Low (0-30%), Medium (31-50%), High (51-70%), and Critical (71-100%). Different intervention types are recommended for different risk levels.

status.title: Status: Applied vs Not Applied
status.description: Applied means the intervention was successfully shown to the user. Not Applied means the intervention was triggered but couldn't be displayed (e.g., user left before it appeared, technical issue, or intervention was disabled).

result.title: Result: Converted, Abandoned, Pending
result.description: Converted: Session completed with a purchase. Abandoned: User left without completing. Pending: Session is still active or outcome hasn't been determined yet.

effectiveness.title: Effectiveness Chart
effectiveness.description: Shows conversion rates by intervention type, comparing sessions with interventions against those without. Helps identify which intervention types are most effective for your store.

detailed.title: Detailed Metrics
detailed.description: Breakdown showing applied, converted, and abandoned counts for each intervention type. Displays conversion rate percentage for each type to help you understand performance.

table.title: Interventions Table
table.description: List of individual interventions with session ID, type, risk score, status, result, and timestamp. Use filters to view specific types, statuses, or results. Sortable by date (most recent first).

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Dynamic checkout personalization based on user behavior

table.title: User Profiles
table.subtitle: List of user profiles in the selected period

help.title: How Personalization Works
help.subtitle: Learn about user profiles, device detection, and personalization features

whatAre.title: What are User Profiles?
whatAre.description: User profiles are automatically created based on user behavior and device characteristics. Each profile contains information about device type, preferences, and behavior patterns to enable personalized checkout experiences.

howCreated.title: How Profiles are Created
howCreated.description: Profiles are created automatically when users interact with your checkout. The system analyzes device type, browser, screen size, interaction patterns, and previous behavior to build comprehensive user profiles.

benefits.title: Benefits of Personalization
benefits.description: Personalized checkouts adapt to user preferences, showing optimized layouts, field orders, and messaging based on device type and behavior patterns. This can significantly improve conversion rates.

detection.title: Device Detection
detection.description: The system automatically detects device type (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet) using browser and screen size information. This enables device-specific optimizations and layouts.

types.title: Supported Device Types
types.description: Three main device types are detected: Desktop (large screens, mouse/keyboard), Mobile (small screens, touch), and Tablet (medium screens, touch). Each type receives optimized experiences.

personalization.title: Device-Based Personalization
personalization.description: Different personalization rules apply based on device type. Mobile users may see simplified forms, while desktop users get more detailed options. This improves usability and conversion.

conversion.title: Conversion Rate
conversion.description: The conversion rate for personalized sessions compared to non-personalized sessions. Higher rates indicate effective personalization strategies.

profiles.title: Total Profiles
profiles.description: The number of unique user profiles created in the selected period. More profiles mean better personalization coverage across your user base.

improvement.title: Conversion Improvement
improvement.description: The percentage improvement in conversion rate when personalization is applied. This metric shows the direct impact of personalization on your checkout performance.

rules.title: Personalization Rules
rules.description: Rules define how the checkout adapts to different user profiles and device types. You can configure field ordering, layout preferences, and messaging based on device and behavior patterns.

settings.title: Personalization Settings
settings.description: Configure personalization features including device detection, profile creation, rule application, and A/B testing options. Settings can be adjusted to optimize for your specific use case.

deviceDistribution.title: Device Distribution Chart
deviceDistribution.description: Shows the distribution of user profiles across different device types (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet). Helps understand your user base composition.

conversion.title: Conversion by Device Chart
conversion.description: Compares conversion rates between personalized and non-personalized sessions, broken down by device type. Shows the effectiveness of personalization for each device category.

trend.title: Profiles Trend Chart
trend.description: Displays the creation and update frequency of user profiles over time. Helps track profile growth and identify trends in user behavior patterns.

table.title: Profiles Table
table.description: Lists individual user profiles with device type, creation date, last update, and associated metrics. Use this to analyze specific profile characteristics and behaviors.

optimization.title: Form Optimization
optimization.description: AI-powered form field optimization for better conversion

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load form optimization data

charts.effectivenessSubtitle: Conversion rate with vs without optimization

table.title: Field Performance Details
table.subtitle: Detailed performance metrics for all fields

help.title: How Form Optimization Works
help.subtitle: Learn about field optimization, step metrics, and performance improvements

whatIs.title: What is Field Optimization?
whatIs.description: Field optimization uses AI to analyze form field performance and automatically optimize field order, labels, placeholders, and validation to improve conversion rates and reduce errors.

howWorks.title: How Optimization Works
howWorks.description: The system analyzes completion rates, error frequencies, time spent, and user behavior for each field. Based on this data, it reorders fields, adjusts labels, and optimizes validation rules to improve the checkout experience.

benefits.title: Benefits of Optimization
benefits.description: Optimized forms reduce completion time, decrease error rates, and improve conversion. Fields are ordered by importance and completion likelihood, making the checkout process smoother and faster.

steps.title: Checkout Steps
steps.description: The checkout is divided into steps (Cart, Profile, Shipping, Payment). Each step has its own metrics including completion rate, error rate, and average time to complete.

completion.title: Completion Rate
completion.description: The percentage of users who successfully complete a step. Higher completion rates indicate better step design and optimization. Low rates may indicate friction points.

errorRate.title: Error Rate
errorRate.description: The percentage of users who encounter errors while completing a step. Lower error rates mean better form design and validation. High error rates may indicate confusing fields or validation issues.

timeToComplete.title: Time to Complete
timeToComplete.description: The average time users spend completing a step. Shorter times generally indicate better UX, but context matters - some steps naturally take longer (e.g., payment verification).

conversion.title: Conversion Rate Improvement
conversion.description: The improvement in conversion rate when optimization is applied. This metric compares optimized vs non-optimized sessions to measure the direct impact of field optimization.

comparison.title: Optimized vs Non-Optimized
comparison.description: Side-by-side comparison of conversion rates, completion times, and error rates between optimized and non-optimized checkouts. Shows the tangible benefits of optimization.

improvement.title: Performance Improvement
improvement.description: Overall improvement metrics including conversion rate increase, error reduction, and time savings. These metrics demonstrate the ROI of form optimization efforts.

effectiveness.title: Effectiveness Chart
effectiveness.description: Shows conversion rates for optimized vs non-optimized checkouts, broken down by step. Helps identify which steps benefit most from optimization.

fieldPerformance.title: Field Performance Chart
fieldPerformance.description: Displays performance metrics for each field including completion rate, error rate, and average time. Helps identify fields that need optimization or are performing well.

trend.title: Performance Trend Chart
trend.description: Shows field performance metrics over time, allowing you to track improvements and identify trends. Useful for measuring the impact of optimization changes.

table.title: Fields Performance Table
table.description: Detailed table listing all fields with their performance metrics, optimization status, and recommendations. Use this to identify specific fields that need attention.

instructions.step2: Create a new API Key and Token

hero.title: BOLT
hero.subtitle: A Modern Checkout
hero.description: Experience a frictionless, secure, and lightning-fast checkout process designed with modern e-commerce best practices.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Built with cutting-edge technology and best practices to ensure a frictionless checkout experience.

customizableTheme.title: Customizable Theme System
customizableTheme.description: Default, Single Page, and Liquid Glass themes. Completely transform your checkout visual experience.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: PCI DSS compliant with complete protection of sensitive data. Your customers can shop with total confidence.

intelligentFlow.title: Intelligent Checkout Flow
intelligentFlow.description: Optimized 4-step flow that reduces friction and increases conversion. Full support for B2C and B2B.

vtexIntegration.title: Native VTEX Integration
vtexIntegration.description: Directly connected to VTEX Checkout API. Leverage the full power of the VTEX platform.

responsiveAccessible.title: Fully Responsive & Accessible
responsiveAccessible.description: Mobile-first design with WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility. Perfect experience on any device.

themeSystem.title: Customizable Theme System
themeSystem.description: Transform your checkout experience with three beautifully designed themes. Each theme offers unique visual styles and layouts to match your brand identity.

defaultTheme.title: Default Theme
defaultTheme.description: Traditional step-by-step layout with sidebar navigation, perfect for users who prefer a familiar checkout experience.

singlePageTheme.title: Single Page Theme
singlePageTheme.description: All steps visible simultaneously with smooth scrolling, ideal for users who want to see the full checkout process at once.

liquidGlassTheme.title: Liquid Glass Theme
liquidGlassTheme.description: Modern glassmorphism design with transparent overlays and animated backgrounds, creating a premium, contemporary feel.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: PCI DSS Level 1 compliant with comprehensive security controls. Your customers' sensitive data is protected with bank-level encryption and industry-leading security practices.

pciCompliant.title: PCI DSS Compliant
pciCompliant.description: Meet the highest standards for payment card data security and compliance.

dataEncryption.title: Data Encryption
dataEncryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.

secureProxy.title: Secure Proxy Pattern
secureProxy.description: Server-side credential handling ensures sensitive data never touches the client-side code.

rateLimiting.title: Rate Limiting & Monitoring
rateLimiting.description: Advanced security monitoring and rate limiting protect against malicious attacks.

intelligentFlow.title: Intelligent Checkout Flow
intelligentFlow.description: A streamlined 4-step process designed to minimize friction and maximize conversion rates. Perfect for both B2C and B2B transactions.

cartReview.title: Cart Review
cartReview.description: Review items, update quantities, and apply discounts

profileData.title: Profile Data
profileData.description: Fast customer data collection with smart validation

shippingAddress.title: Shipping Address
shippingAddress.description: Automatic address lookup and shipping calculation

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Secure payment processing with multiple options

intelligentFlow.featuresText: Corporate Profiles • Coupon Codes • Real-time Validation

vtexIntegration.title: Native VTEX Integration
vtexIntegration.description: Built from the ground up for VTEX. Direct integration with VTEX Checkout API ensures seamless data flow and access to all platform capabilities.

directApi.title: Direct API Access
directApi.description: Full access to VTEX Checkout API endpoints with proper authentication and error handling.

orderFormManagement.title: OrderForm Management
orderFormManagement.description: Complete OrderForm lifecycle management with real-time updates and synchronization.

paymentProcessing.title: Payment Processing
paymentProcessing.description: Seamless integration with VTEX payment providers and transaction management.

shippingSimulation.title: Shipping Simulation
shippingSimulation.description: Automatic shipping cost calculation and delivery options based on VTEX logistics.

responsiveAccessible.title: Fully Responsive & Accessible
responsiveAccessible.description: Built with a mobile-first approach and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Every user, on any device, gets a perfect checkout experience.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First Design
mobileFirst.description: Optimized for touch interactions and smaller screens with responsive breakpoints.

wcagCompliant.title: WCAG 2.1 AA Compliant
wcagCompliant.description: Full keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and proper ARIA labels throughout.

crossDevice.title: Cross-Device Compatibility
crossDevice.description: Tested and optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices across all major browsers.

performanceOptimized.title: Performance Optimized
performanceOptimized.description: Fast load times and smooth animations ensure a delightful user experience on any connection.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At BOLT, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our checkout platform and dashboard services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information automatically collected when you use our services:

items.personal: Personal information such as name, email address, and company details
items.usage: Information about how you use our services and dashboard
items.device: Device information including IP address, browser type, and operating system

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.communication: Communicate with you about your account and our services
items.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
items.security: Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats

dataProtection.title: Data Protection & Security
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataProtection.measures: Our security measures include encryption, access controls, regular security assessments, and compliance with industry standards including PCI DSS.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our services and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
cookies.types: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our services.

items.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.correction: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: Object to processing of your personal data
items.portability: Request transfer of your personal data to another service

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our services may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the privacy policies or practices of any third-party services.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the BOLT checkout platform and dashboard services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: BOLT provides a headless checkout platform with analytics dashboard, theme customization, and integration capabilities. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to:

items.accountability: Take full responsibility for all activities under your account
items.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
items.notification: Immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:

items.lawful: Use the service in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
items.prohibited: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the service
items.accuracy: Provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating an account

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of BOLT and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. You agree to pay all fees associated with your subscription plan. Fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as explicitly stated in your plan.
paymentTerms.refunds: Refund requests must be submitted within 30 days of the initial purchase. We reserve the right to approve or deny refund requests at our discretion.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BOLT shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the applicable arbitration association.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us:

seo.title: Contact Us - BOLT
seo.description: Get in touch with the BOLT team. Request more information or schedule a demo of our checkout platform.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: Have questions? Want to schedule a demo? We're here to help! Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your needs, questions, or how we can help...

demo.label: I would like to schedule a demo

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We have received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.

error.generic: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

demo.title: Schedule a Demo
demo.description: See BOLT in action with a personalized demo
